'''Mountain of Festive Gifts''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Mountain of Festive Gifts is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Oceansong|Oceansong]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|time = 16h
